author: Jim Knight
title: Can the Soccerway betting guide beat last week's total of nine winners? - Goal.com
text:
Can the Soccerway betting guide beat last week's total of nine winners? Getty 0 Feb 9, 2017 09:01:10 With a total of 17 recommended picks including one for Tottenham's trip to Liverpool, the latest guide is a must-have for those who are planning a bet 
There's another action-packed weekend of football to prepare for and the Soccerway betting guide has become an essential part of punters' studying up. 
Over the last few weeks the team have been consistently providing plenty of winning selections, with the most recent release landing a tally of nine correct picks, leading to a very solid level stakes profit once again. 
You can get your hands on Edition 21 by registering with Soccerway for free . Once completed, you'll be emailed a copy of the latest betting guide as soon as it's released. This usually takes place on Friday morning. 
All registered users can also log in to their Soccerway account and download a copy of the latest guide via their profile page. This can be done on desktop, mobile or tablet so punters can stay up to date with all the latest picks wherever they are. 
Thousands of members are now benefitting from this targeted betting research every week and which has already led to three successful accumulators being landed this season. 
Those five-folds returned between 9/1 (10.0) and 10/1 (11.0) but for those looking for a more solid approach, there are 16 other match previews to get stuck into from across the world. 
Covering a range of betting angles to help you decipher where the value lies, there's also a look at what the latest Opta facts say about the upcoming fixtures in the top flight in the Key Stats section. 
Whether you're searching for a head-to-head angle, recent form trends, goal analysis or even a goalscorer pick, the Soccerway team have you covered. 
Don't miss out on the next release, simply register using the links provided and you'll be in line to receive Edition 21 as soon as itâ€™s available.
